hero.title: Stop Wasting Time Hunting for Leads.
hero.subtitle: Get instant access to 82,740+ verified local businesses across 20 industries in 184 countries. Names, phones, emails, addresses — all ready to download.
hero.subtext: Other lead providers charge $0.50-$2.00 per lead. We start at $0.035. Do the math.

problem.title: Finding Quality Leads Shouldn't Be This Hard
problem.subtitle: If you're still doing any of these, you're leaving money on the table.

manual.title: Googling one business at a time
manual.desc: Spending hours copying names and numbers from Google Maps. Time you'll never get back.

expensive.title: Overpaying for lead databases
expensive.desc: Most providers charge $0.50-$2.00 per lead. For 500 leads, that's $250-$1,000. Every single month.

outdated.title: Working with stale, outdated data
outdated.desc: Bought a list last year? Half those businesses have changed their phone numbers or closed.

generic.title: Using generic business directories
generic.desc: Yellow Pages won't tell you which tattoo studios have Instagram or which gyms have websites.

solution.title: One Platform. Every Lead You Need.
solution.subtitle: IndustryDB gives you verified, industry-specific business data at a fraction of the cost. Search, filter, export. Done.

targeted.title: Industry-Specific
targeted.desc: Not a generic directory. Purpose-built data for 20 industries — from tattoo studios to law firms.

verified.title: Verified & Updated
verified.desc: Every lead is verified with real addresses, phone numbers, and business details you can trust.

instant.title: Instant Export
instant.desc: Search, filter by country and city, and export to CSV in seconds. No waiting, no sales calls.

value.title: Your Next 500 Clients Are Already in Our Database
value.subtitle: Verified data you can call, email, and close — not scraped junk that wastes your time.

address.title: Full Physical Addresses
address.desc: — with GPS coordinates for field sales

quality.title: Lead Quality Scores
quality.desc: — focus on leads most likely to convert

export.title: Instant CSV & Excel Export
export.desc: — download and start calling in 30 seconds

industries.title: 20 Industries. One Platform.
industries.subtitle: Whether you sell to restaurants or recruit for law firms, we have the data you need.

comparison.title: Stop Overpaying for Bad Data
comparison.subtitle: The average business spends $198 per lead through traditional channels. We think that's insane.

others.title: Traditional Lead Providers
others.data: Generic data with 30-40% bounce rates — you pay for bad numbers
others.contracts: Annual contracts, minimum seats, and hidden overage fees
others.industries: One-size-fits-all lists with no industry expertise

us.title: The IndustryDB Way
us.price: From $0.07/lead — up to 8x cheaper than Apollo or UpLead
us.data: Verified addresses, phones, emails, and quality scores — updated monthly
us.contracts: No contracts. No minimums. Cancel anytime. Start free.
us.industries: 20 specialized industries with sub-niches across 184 countries

pricing.title: One New Client Pays for a Full Year
pricing.subtitle: While competitors charge $15,000+/year, you get verified industry leads starting at $49/month.

free.name: Free
free.description: Test the data before you commit

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: 500 leads at $0.098 each — cheaper than a coffee

landing.freeLeadsNote: Start free. 50 leads/month. No credit card required.

guarantee.title: Zero Risk. Cancel Anytime.
guarantee.desc: Start with our free plan — no credit card needed. Upgrade only when you're ready. No contracts, no commitments, no hidden fees. If it doesn't work for you, you don't pay.

cta.title: Your Next 50 Leads Are Free.
cta.subtitle: Stop guessing. Start closing. Get verified business data in 30 seconds.

features.title: Everything you need to find quality leads

verified.title: Verified Data
verified.description: All business information is verified and regularly updated

affordable.title: Affordable Pricing
affordable.description: Plans starting at just $49/month with flexible options

easy.title: Easy to Use
easy.description: Search, filter, and export leads in minutes

instantAccess.title: Instant Access
instantAccess.description: Search and export data instantly. No waiting, no delays

delete.title: Delete API Key?

home.title: IndustryDB - Verified Business Leads by Industry
home.description: Access 82,740+ verified local business leads across 20 industries in 184 countries. Names, phones, emails, addresses. Starting at $0.035 per lead.

pricing.title: Pricing Plans - IndustryDB
pricing.description: Affordable business lead plans starting at $0/month. Get verified leads for tattoo studios, beauty salons, gyms, restaurants, and 16 more industries.

login.title: Sign In - IndustryDB
login.description: Sign in to your IndustryDB account to access verified business leads and data exports.

register.title: Create Account - IndustryDB
register.description: Create a free IndustryDB account and get 50 verified business leads per month. No credit card required.
